# BindPath.Part.parameter(_:)

**Case**

A path component to animate a named parameter.

## Declaration

```swift
case parameter(String)
```

## Discussion

This path component terminates an array of paths, and at the same time specifies a named scene or entity property that animates.

## Choosing the path component

- **BindPath.Part.anchorEntity(_:)**: A path component for the scene’s anchor entity.
- **BindPath.Part.entity(_:)**: A path component for a nested entity.
- **BindPath.Part.jointTransforms**: A path component to animate joint transforms.
- **BindPath.Part.scene(_:)**: A path component for a nested scene.
- **BindPath.Part.transform**: A path component to animate a transform.
